PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-00032016-01-13,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActShared Services Canada Act
SubjectShared Services Canada
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2015-1071 of July 16, 2015 by removing Courts Administration Service (CAS) and the Registrar from the group of federal entities that must obtain their IT goods and services from Shared Services Canada (SSC), making them optional clients of SSC instead.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
